Privacy Policy

10. Handling of Cookie Information

The Company may acquire Cookie information from the Website operated by the Company and tools provided by business operators, etc.

The Company may provide user's hashed email address, name, mailing address, phone number, and other personal information to third-party advertisers for the purpose of delivering advertisements that are relevant to the user and user's interest and to measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
